name: Marvellous Bird Photography
description:
Made within 2 weeks for Cozy Autumn Game Jam 2022.

We recommend the PC build for the best experience.

  • mastermagpie- Programmer, Music
  • akilic - Programmer
  • W35- Designer
  • Cal - Sound Engineer, Music

Your uncle has noticed a lot of strange and unusual birds appearing in the garden. He has tasked you with attracting them to the garden with various objects and cataloguing them for future research! 

  • Move camera with [W], [A], [S], [D]
  • [SPACE] to take photo
  • [Z], [X], [Scroll Wheel] to zoom camera
  • [Q], [E] to rotate a prop (incl. camera)

Shortcuts:

  • [C] to open camera
  • [B] to open shop
  • [I] to open inventory
  • [P] to open photo album

There's a lady in the shop who is willing to give you tips for £10. These will show up in your photo album and will tell you what different birds like and dislike! Find the correct pairing of garden props to attract the right birds, or even scare away certain species of bird!

Look out for the cat! It may be lurking under a tree. There'll be a cat icon above its head. Just click on the cat if you want to scare it away. 

The camera is [Noisy]. Some birds hate noise! You can put the camera (or any prop) back into your inventory by dragging it down to the bottom of the screen into the inventory when it automatically pops up.
